channel.title: Can I use this chipset with graphics card?
channel.description:
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/rwnnr7.jpg[/img]
It says graphics: gma x4500, can I instead use a nvidia card with it? The reason why i want to do this is because It's cheaper to do it that way.
Thanks

item.title: Can I use this chipset with graphics card?
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

http://dinopc.com/shop/pc/Intel-H55-Chipset-110p781.htm <<try it, it’s really hard for me to get it balanced. I’d like to have i5 760 (4x2.8) or i7, with the gtx 460, budget = £700 including os windows premium without screen. Thanks for help guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Can I use this chipset with graphics card?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

I james I:

So I was thinking of putting a nvidia gtx 460 1GB in it, with 700w psu. Will this motherboard give any limitations?

what the fuck are you buying a micro atx mobo for? and no it wont

Read full topic

item.title: Can I use this chipset with graphics card?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282

@sanga282 wrote:

onboard can just be disabled in the BIOS, so yes you can

item.source: Can I use this chipset with graphics card?

item.title: Can I use this chipset with graphics card?
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

You need a 16x pci express slot [might need 2.0 for some cards] and a good amount of space in your computer. Also a psu thats capable of handling it.

Read full topic
